user_query: I'm planning a beach wedding in Hawaii next year. Can you please give me the weather forecast for the next seven days? Also, fetch the historical weather data for the same period last year. Additionally, I would like to know the current phase and illumination of the moon.

TaskList.description: Fetch the weather forecast for the next seven days in Hawaii.
Fetch the historical weather data for the same period last year in Hawaii.
Get the current phase and illumination of the moon.
